title: Equipments & Assets Required

description_intro_part1: When organizing a blood donation camp for
description_intro_part3: the following equipment should be arranged to ensure a smooth and comfortable process:
list_item_3_text: Chairs or benches for donors to sit (Must accommodate at least 30 donors at once while waiting or resting after donation)
list_item_5_text: All necessary medical supplies, beds and other equipment required for the blood collection process will be provided by the National Blood Transfusion Service (NBTS) or the nearest blood bank.
